ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS 4 Hot Plasma Composition Analyzer (HPCA) Time of Flight, TOF, Counts, Quick-Look Survey, Level 2 (L2), PT0.625S Data
ResourceHeader.Description: Hot Plasma Composition Analyzer (HPCA) Time of Flight, TOF, Counts, Level 2, Survey 10 s Data. The MMS HPCA instruments measure the energy and composition of magnetospheric plasmas in the energy range from 1 eV to 40 keV. An electrostatic energy analyzer (ESA) that is optically coupled to a carbon-foil based Time-of-Flight (TOF) section comprises each HPCA. The basic HPCA data product is an array of counts for 5 ion species, at 63 energies, for each of 16 elevation anodes. Sixteen basic products, also called azimuths, are acquired every 10 s; half a spacecraft spin period nominally has 16 azimuths. The five ion species are protons (H+), alpha particles (He++), helium ions (He+), singly charged Oxygen (O+), and background counts.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Confer with PI for rules of acknowledgement. Determined by the Principal Investigator.

Parameter.Name: MMS4 HPCA TOF Counts, all Angles, selected Energies
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description:
MMS4 HPCA Time of Flight, TOF, Counts, all Angles, selected Energies, spectrogram display.
* Column 1 Labels from MMS4_HPCA_TOF_ENERGY: ["Energy 3.21425","Energy 12.0167","Energy 45.0507","Energy 168.833","Energy 632.809","Energy 2371.97","Energy 8890.78","Energy 29319.6"]. * Column 2 Labels from MMS4_HPCA_TOF_BIN_INDEX: ["Index#0","Index#2","Index#4","Index#6","Index#8","Index#10","Index#12","Index#14","Index#16","Index#18","Index#20","Index#22","Index#24","Index#26","Index#28","Index#30","Index#32","Index#34","Index#36","Index#38","Index#40","Index#42","Index#44","Index#46","Index#48","Index#50","Index#52","Index#54","Index#56","Index#58","Index#60","Index#62","Index#64","Index#66","Index#68","Index#70","Index#72","Index#74","Index#76","Index#78","Index#80","Index#82","Index#84","Index#86","Index#88","Index#90","Index#92","Index#94","Index#96","Index#98","Index#100","Index#102","Index#104","Index#106","Index#108","Index#110","Index#112","Index#114","Index#116","Index#118","Index#120","Index#122","Index#124","Index#126","Index#128","Index#130","Index#132","Index#134","Index#136","Index#138","Index#140","Index#142","Index#144","Index#146","Index#148","Index#150","Index#152","Index#154","Index#156","Index#158","Index#160","Index#162","Index#164","Index#166","Index#168","Index#170","Index#172","Index#174","Index#176","Index#178","Index#180","Index#182","Index#184","Index#186","Index#188","Index#190","Index#192","Index#194","Index#196","Index#198","Index#200","Index#202","Index#204","Index#206","Index#208","Index#210","Index#212","Index#214","Index#216","Index#218","Index#220","Index#222","Index#224","Index#226","Index#228","Index#230","Index#232","Index#234","Index#236","Index#238","Index#240","Index#242","Index#244","Index#246","Index#248","Index#250","Index#252","Index#254"].
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: mms4_hpca_tof_counts.
